page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: There are two residential policemen who cover l6 hours a day. They patrol on foot or pedal cycle. There is overall cover from Pocklington. Superimposed on that is traffic cover. Support is given from sub-divisional H.Q. in Goole. The base for the dog and horse section is l0 miles away at Walkington. Not a lot of serious crime as a fairly good standard of living in the area. Mainly burglaries and assaults. Assaults are usually by young folk in l7-25 age range when drunk or are of a domestic nature. Glue sniffing seems to have died out and drug taking is not a big problem. Market Weighton Police Station is now used solely as a Magistrates Court which meets once a fortnight. More serious crimes are dealt with at Beverley, York and Leeds.
